text: Puja Gupta (born 30 January 1984 in Kozhikode, Kerala, India) was the winner of Miss India Universe in 2007. She represented India in Miss Universe 2007 and placed in the top ten. Puja Gupta wants to be a writer and her hobbies are yoga, writing, horse riding and drawing. Category:Beauty pageant winners Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Indian models
title: Puja Gupta
